resources.string:
1. To save chat use save chat command. 
2. To remove all the chat use Remove all chat command. 
3. To disconnect use Disconnect command. 
4. To change the background use Change background as(your choice) command. 
5. To disable the voice enable mode you can use either Voice mode off command or can manually disable it. 
6. To share a file use Share a file command. 
7. To reset layout as default use Reset layout command.
